name: Organic Yellow Pear Tomato
description: Yellow Pear has a sweet, mild, almost lemony flavor. This 1800's variety produces clusters of very attractive fruit you can eat like grapes all summer long. It is an intermediate tomato that will continue to grow indefinitely until frost. Indeterminate. 65 Days. Minimum 25 Seeds

name: Organic Cherokee Purple Heirloom Tomato Seed
description:
An old Cherokee Indian heirloom, pre-1890 variety; beautiful deep dusky purple-pink color, superb sweet flavor, and very large sized fruit. 

Unusual for the deep purple/red hue of its fruit. It was one of the first of the "black" color group of tomatoes. It is also unusual in being extremely popular for the sake of its flavor, instead of only its unusual color. Cherokee Purple tomatoes are beefsteak in style, with green "shoulders" across the top. They are also notable for having a dense, juicy texture, with small seed locules irregularly scattered throughout the flesh. 
Indeterminate 80 days 25 heirloom seeds

name: Organic Caspian Pink Heirloom Tomato Seed
description: The Caspian Pink originated in southern Russia’s Caspian Sea region. It is an incredibly sweet and juicy fruit that can grow 1 to 2 pounds. Indeterminate. 80 days. This tomato plant does best in cooler conditions. minimum 25 seeds

name: Organic Camp Joy Cherry Tomato Seeds
description: Heavy bearing variety that offers an abundance of 1" fruit. They have a huge, well-balanced, sweet tomato flavor and strong disease resistance. Indeterminate. 80 Days. 25 Organic Seeds

name: Organic Old German Heirloom Tomato Seed
description: Old German was a favorite of Mennonite families from the Shenandoah Valley area of Virginia, and dates back to the mid-1800′s. It is known to grow to a robust size of almost 2 pounds. The Old German tomato is bi-colored, featuring golden yellow and reddish stripes. It is not heralded as a heavy producer. The large size and excellent taste of this tomato more than makes up for its sometimes lack of production. Indeterminate 75 to 80 days  20 Organic Heirloom Seeds
